actions.text: On agreeing to the Spratt amendment (A004) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 232 (Roll no. 91).
Spratt amendment (A004) modified by unanimous consent. Section 509 is deleted from the text of the Spratt substitute.
Amendment (A004) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Spratt.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Spratt.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Spratt amendment (A004) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 232 (Roll no. 91).
Roll call votes on amendments in House

description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute printed in House Report 108-446 and numbered 4 as modified was offered as the Democratic substitute.
purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute numbered 4 printed in House Report 108-446 to balance the budget by FY 2012 and to establish the pay- as-you-go (PAYGO) point of order in House rules that could be raised against any tax cuts or spending increases that are not offset.
